column2: Do you know what they have done to me? came the answer through the closed door.
column3: Do you know what they have done to me? came the answer through the closed door.

column2: No. Tell me, Brother, what have they done?
column3: no Tell me, Brother, what have they done?

column2: She was right!	She was right!
Shaggy looked at the little square of cloth and shook his head.
column3: Shaggy looked at the little square of cloth and shook his head.
